content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85--87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0, -86.0), (39.0, -85.0), and (37.0, -85.0)
- Collection chests at positions (40.5, -87.5), (39.5, -83.5), and (36.5, -86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5, -86.5) and (35.5, -85.5)
All drills are working and mining coal, with chests containing coal for distribution

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Collection chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Transport belt system
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
Currently not operational due to lack of fuel

### Smelting Line at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 5 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output
Connected by transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5, 22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5, 20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles providing power distribution
Currently partially operational, boiler needs fuel

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is available in inventory before attempting to fuel machines
- Check machine fuel levels regularly to prevent work stoppage

### Machine Placement Errors
- Verify input/output connections are properly aligned before placing machines
- Ensure sufficient space exists for all components of a production line

### Resource Flow Issues
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow and production stoppage
- Clear full output chests regularly to maintain production flow

### Power System Issues
- Connect all power-requiring entities to the electrical network
- Maintain fuel supply to boilers to ensure consistent power generation
